title: Ozark National Scenic Riverways: Craft Demonstrations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Craft Demonstrations              Traditional Craft & Skills Demonstrations         Fiddlemaking, a traditional art. National Park Service     The park will host a variety of fun and educational events that bring back the voices of the Ozarks frontier. Enjoy demonstrations of traditional skills, nibble some hoe cake, listen to down home Bluegrass music or learn to spin or make lye soap. Join us for upcoming demonstrations at Big Spring. Be sure to attend our annual Heritage Day Event at Big Spring.       All the things we take for granted: soap, baskets, rugs, clothes, tools, once had to be made by hand. Come on down to Alley and get up close and personal with the past.       Back to RANGER PROGRAMS  Ozark History Page
